alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 4:25PM CDT until July 21 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... Eastern Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 425 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hackett, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Greenwood... Barling... Pocola... Hackett... Bonanza... Excelsior... Jenny Lind... Rock Island... Rye Hill... Jenson... This includes Interstate 540 between mile markers 13 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
